attributes.action: Call for the Knighthood Of Harry Gregg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 6th of February 1958 the Busby Babes were on their way back to Manchester from Belgrade when their Plane had to land in Munich for a re-fuel, on take off from munich at approximately 15:04 pm the Plane collided with a house on take off, the plane had barreled into a house and ripped the plane apart, out of the wreckage came a young Harry Gregg he looked around the grounds of the crash and saw the devastation, Captain Jim Thain advised Harry to run for it but he didnt, he heard a young Cry coming from the plane, it was that of a baby, Then Harry without any consideration Burrowed through the burning wreckage to look for this young baby, Harry pulled the Baby from the wreckage and then went back into help, he pulled the babies Mother out of the wreckage who was also Pregnant at the time and he also went back in to help his friends
Harry Gregg Then went on to play for Manchester United for nearly 10 years, he played after Munich even though most if his team mates were still in hospital
Over the years Harry Gregg has Done alot for the Game of football and also does charity events, some people say he has never been honoured for what he has done, i will let you decide that

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
